author: Special Correspondent
text:
Some 30 employees of a fireworks unit at Ramasamypuram under Vachchakarapatti police station limits had a miraculous escape when an accidental fire razed down a working shed on Thursday morning.

The police said that the employees who had just assembled at the unit managed to run away to a safe distance as they heard the explosion around 9.30 a.m..

Friction caused during mixing of chemicals at the mixing room had led to the accident. The fireworks unit, owned by Shanmugasundaram of Muthalipatti, was being run on lease by Charles alias Ranjith Kumar. Three fire tenders doused the flames.
title: Fire at cracker unit
